description.value:
Frequency once per day

Effect The Risen Nemesis expresses a vengeful interest in a target within 30 feet. The creature must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:42] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} for 1 minute (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). On failure or critical failure, the Risen Nemesis also gains a +2 status bonus on Strikes and damage rolls against the target until the target or the Risen Nemesis dies, whichever comes first.
